item.title: State of Numbness
item.author: ahmed@offsechq.com (A.Alghali)
item.description: Early to rise early to bed, makes a man healthy but socially dead fantasy character quote

item.title: why im doing this
item.author: ahmed@offsechq.com (A.Alghali)
item.description:
do things badly

As the years pass by, I found my self adapt to different reason to keep living. to share. I’m not as clear as I use to about why I should be posting, but looking back over the years I recall how writing started. how reasons changed.
